Banner.Description: I have 3.5 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I focus on writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and Ionic, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 3.5 years of experience I've covered many roles: frontend developer, backend developer, System Analyst, and technical leader. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing improvements in systems, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether as a hobby or for utility.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack developer
Description: development of five projects at Quadralyst, utilizing Angular and Ionic to build responsive mobile and web applications.
Employed Cloud Firebase for backend services and Firebase for data management, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.
Actively participated in project planning, defining project goals, timelines, and ensuring successful delivery.
Developed key functionalities across projects, enhancing user experiences and optimizing application performance.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack developer
Description: Successfully delivered projects, applying Angular and Ionic to create dynamic and responsive applications for both mobile and web platforms.
Utilized Cloud Firebase as the backend infrastructure and Firebase for database management, ensuring efficient and scalable solutions.
Took an active role in project planning, setting clear objectives, managing timelines, and ensuring alignment with client expectations.
Focused on developing core functionalities that enhanced application performance and provided a seamless user experience.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lights There
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The project integrates card and barcode scanning technology, allowing users to capture and save detailed information from business cards. This feature extracts and stores key data such as contact details, memories, and author information directly from the scanned card, streamlining the process of information management for users. The app enhances user productivity by simplifying data entry and providing an intuitive way to store essential business details.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: HSBC
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The HSBC banking app provides a comprehensive productivity dashboard designed to streamline task management and planning. Users can efficiently track tasks , monitor progress , and organize their daily activities, ensuring optimal productivity and seamless banking operations.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Medstoch
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Medstoch is a supply chain and business network app tailored for pharmaceutical stockists and retailers . It provides a seamless platform for managing medicine wholesale operations, featuring user-friendly mobile apps for both users and delivery personnel. In addition, an admin dashboard via a website allows efficient management of orders, deliveries, and inventory, streamlining the entire pharmaceutical supply chain.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Pub Partner
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A social networking app designed to help users find a pub partner . Users can connect, chat , and schedule meetups , selecting both the date and pub for their gathering. The app facilitates easy planning and communication, making it convenient for people to find like-minded partners for pub outings.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: PartyTambola
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A digital Tambola/Housie app that lets users enjoy the classic game without the need for physical tickets or pens. The app allows players to join games, generate digital tickets, and mark numbers automatically, providing a seamless and modern way to experience Tambola.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Vlees-in-the-Box
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Vlees-in-the-Box is an online butcher offering premium, freshly cut meat delivered straight to your door. With a focus on high-quality cuts and expertly prepared meats, it provides the convenience of home delivery, ensuring customers enjoy fresh and delicious products at their fingertips.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Rullo
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A mobile application that enables users to discover nearby bars and restaurants with real-time ratings, images, and map integration for a location-based search. The app helps users explore new spots, see reviews, and easily find the best places to eat and drink based on their preferences and location.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Train Me Hire Me
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A job searching and career development app designed to connect users with job opportunities while providing resources for skill enhancement. Users can browse job listings, receive career advice, and access training materials to improve their employability.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Step It APP
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A cutting-edge fitness application that leverages an ESP32 board to provide real-time tracking of exercise data. This app connects seamlessly with a mobile device via Bluetooth, allowing users to monitor their workouts.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Bhautiki
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: An educational app specifically designed to help students prepare for the JEE and NEET . The app offers a comprehensive suite of resources, including video lectures, practice tests, study materials, and performance analytics.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Standard Bank
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: An emergency response app that integrates various services into one platform, revolutionizing how individuals deal with emergency situations.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
